title: NovaNest Academy
subtitle: Learn, Experience, and Grow with Real Startup Teams
description: At NovaNest Academy, we believe real learning happens through practical experience. Teenagers and young adults work in a professional, dynamic environment — developing practical skills through real projects alongside experienced local and international mentors. Our mission is to discover talent, develop skills, and prepare young professionals for successful careers.

text: By providing comprehensive programs and resources, and through a combination of mentoring, skill-building workshops, and exposure to various opportunities, NovaNest Venture equips participants with the tools and knowledge necessary to thrive and succeed in their chosen fields.

why.title: Why Join NovaNest Academy?
why.description: Learning goes beyond the classroom — it happens through hands-on experience.
list: Work in a dynamic, innovative, and youthful environment
Opportunities for growth in an international team
Collaborate with successful entrepreneurs and investors
Participate for free in crash courses organized by the academy
Learn to use professional tools like Trello, Google Workspace, and Microsoft Office
Gain mentorship from experienced local and international professionals
Work on international projects and gain global experience
Receive an official certificate of internship completion and potential placement in NovaNest’s core team

steps.title: Getting Started
steps.subtitle: Introduction and Skill Discovery
text: At this stage, you’ll enter NovaNest’s work environment and become familiar with our values, team structure, and type of activities.
During this trial period (up to three months), you’ll work on several small real-world projects to be evaluated on commitment, teamwork, work quality, and professional ethics.
achivement: Real work experience in an international environment
Access to NovaNest’s workspace, including an organizational email and account
Introduction on our website and social media as part of the team

steps.title: Experience and Growth
steps.subtitle: Specialized Internship in Real Projects
steps.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' class='w-full h-full'><path d='M2 3h6a4 4 0 0 1 4 4v14a3 3 0 0 0-3-3H2z'/><path d='M22 3h-6a4 4 0 0 0-4 4v14a3 3 0 0 1 3-3h7z'/></svg>
text: After completing the trial stage, you’ll enter the internship phase. During this stage (up to six months), you’ll work alongside professional mentors on real NovaNest and portfolio startup projects.
The goal is to gain hands-on experience, strengthen your skills, and grow in a real work environment. Mentors will guide and support you throughout the journey.
achivement: Official completion certificate from NovaNest Academy
Real, internationally recognized work experience for your resume
Readiness to join NovaNest’s core team or one of its startups
Introduction on our website and social media as a core team member

steps.title: Joining the Professional Team
steps.subtitle: Official Collaboration
steps.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' class='w-full h-full'><rect x='2' y='7' width='20' height='14' rx='2' ry='2'/><path d='M16 21V5a2 2 0 0 0-2-2h-4a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v16'/></svg>
text: At this stage, you’ll become part of NovaNest’s core professional team and get the opportunity to collaborate on internal and international projects.
Collaboration may take the form of employment, contracting, or commission-based work.
A clear career growth path will also be defined for you, allowing you to advance from specialized roles to leadership positions such as team lead or project manager.
achivement: Official collaboration contract with NovaNest or its portfolio startups
Introduction on the NovaNest website as a core team member
Full access to company resources and the online workspace
Opportunities for growth and leadership in major international projects

accordion.header: Can I leave the internship if it’s not suitable?
content: Yes, but we recommend consulting with your mentors before making a decision.

accordion.header: Is this opportunity only for residents of Canada?
content: No, applicants from around the world are welcome. Some positions may require physical presence in Canada.

accordion.header: How can I increase my chances of joining the core team?
content: Demonstrate commitment, continuous learning, and strong performance in projects.

accordion.header: What are the benefits of official employment?
content: Salary, benefits, professional growth opportunities, international projects, and collaboration with a high-performing team
Yes, many positions are remote, though some may require physical presence.

accordion.header: Can I change departments or roles later?
content: Yes, if you have the required skills, you can move to other teams.

accordion.header: Do I receive an official certificate?
content: Yes, at the end of the internship, an official certificate is provided.
Complete the online registration form below to submit your application.

accordion.header: How long does it take to get a response?
content: Usually 7–10 business days.

accordion.header: Who can I contact for more questions?
content: You can reach out via email for further inquiries.
